1:
I will extol you, my God, King;\q I will bless your name forever and ever.
\q
2:
Every day will I bless you;\q I will praise your name forever and ever.
\q
3:
Great is Yahweh and greatly to be praised;\q his greatness is unsearchable.


\q
4:
One generation will praise your deeds to the next\q and will proclaim your mighty actions.
\q
5:
I will meditate on the majesty of your glory\q and on your marvelous deeds.


\q
6:
They will speak of the power of your awesome works,\q and I will declare your greatness.
\q
7:
They will declare your abounding goodness,\q and they will sing about your righteousness.


\q
8:
Yahweh is gracious and merciful,\q slow to anger and abounding in covenant faithfulness.
\q
9:
Yahweh is good to all;\q his tender mercies are over all his works.


\q
10:
All you have made will give thanks to you, Yahweh;\q your faithful ones will bless you.
\q
11:
Your faithful ones will speak of the glory of your kingdom,\q and they will tell of your power.
\q
12:
They will make known to mankind God's mighty deeds\q and the glorious splendor of his kingdom.


\q
13:
Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom,\q and your dominion endures throughout all generations.


\q
14:
Yahweh supports all who are falling\q and raises up all those who are bent over.
\q
15:
The eyes of all wait for you;\q you give them their food at the right time.
\q
16:
You open your hand\q and satisfy the desire of every living thing.


\q
17:
Yahweh is righteous in all his ways\q and gracious in all he does.
\q
18:
Yahweh is near to all those who call to him,\q to all who call to him in trustworthiness.
\q
19:
He fulfills the desire of those who honor him;\q he hears their cry and saves them.


\q
20:
Yahweh watches over all those who love him,\q but he will destroy all the wicked.
\q
21: My mouth will speak out the praise of Yahweh;\q let all mankind bless his holy name forever and ever.
